phrases: To awaken us, the young mankind,
and fight to protect their loved ones
will set out on their journey as the war rages on
Slicing through the darkness, they fly toward
that blue planet that shines in the distance
The alien spacecraft that fell to Earth ten years before
has been reborn as the gigantic battleship Macross.
However, on the day that the Macross was scheduled to be launched,
its automatic defense system of alien origin suddenly activated itself,
firing the main cannon and destroying an unidentified warship.
Humanity was plunged into unavoidable conflict.
Meanwhile, Lynn Minmay, a young girl attending the launch ceremony,
have also found themselves in the midst of the battle.
At this moment, the Macross is making its way into space.
I guess the shock was a little too much for him.
I left something on South Ataria Island, and I am going back to get it.
Have some other squadron fly escort for the Macross.
Well... Valkyrie VT-102 and its pilot.
Now that you mention it, there was something strange about that pilot.
Well, it is not so surprising...
This is not something I would want a girl to have to see...
You look like you are shaking.
How long do you plan on staying here goofing off?
Aliens have the hots for you, huh?
We are now engaging main thrusters.
Prepare for retrieval of Valkyrie squadrons.
All units, move into landing positions.
Hayase, is the Valkyrie retrieval completed?
All that is left is Major Focker and the civilian pilot in VT-102.
Knowing Focker, there is nothing to worry about.
Vanessa, where are ARMD-I and ARMD-II?
They are nearly at the rendezvous point and currently decelerating.
But it is strange, is not it, Captain?
If the enemy fleet can launch that kind of attack from orbit,
then why are not they firing on us now?
So, that is bothering you too?
They may be toying with us.
You have got to be kidding!
I am not going to go to the Macross!
If you take her back to the island, you will be risking her life!
And you call yourself a man?!
Um, my aunt and uncle are on the island in the shelter.
If they are in the shelter, they will be fine!
Even if this does turn into an all-out war.
But I really would like to go back to the island...
Once the fighting's over, I will take you back personally.
That is what really worries me!
Did you find what you would left behind?
Yeah, the enemy had him scared so bad, he was falling over himself!
That would explain why he did not know anything.
Hey, what is with the old lady?
She is the flight control officer of the Macross.
So, even Hikaru thinks she looks like an old lady?
I will expect a thorough explanation
as to why you let a civilian board VT-102.
This is not over for you by a long shot!
People like her can be pretty scary.
We would appreciate it if you did not kill yourself when you land.
Retrieval of Reguld platoons is now in progress.
Only half of them are unharmed?
What is the enemy ship doing?
It is currently ascending through the planet's upper atmosphere.
They appear be trying to rendezvous with the space fleet from earlier.
It would be simple to shoot them down, but that ship interests me.
If they enter orbit, there is a possibility they will execute a fold and escape.
We will have to launch a containment attack before they can join up with the others.
But why do you have to kill each other?
I just cannot understand the military...
You did some shooting yourself, though, did not you?
I never imagined something like that could be inside.
Well, I mean, if we left something like this on the battlefield,
it would just get in the way.
So I, uh, had it stashed away.
This is the plane from the air show this morning, is not it?
Rendezvous with ARMD-I and ARMD-II is complete.
Well, I have got work to do.
If you start wandering around, you will get lost.
The enemy fleet appears to be regrouping.
Fire a barrage between the fleet and the battleship!
I do not care about the smaller ships, but do NOT hit that battleship.
It is coming from the same orbit as before.
ARMD-I has been destroyed, along with the Miranda and the Akishima.
How much damage did we take?
We have taken no direct hits.
We have almost completed a single orbit.
Claudia, make it look like we are going to land at South Ataria,
You mean the Fold System, sir?
But, we have not tested it yet!
But, if we just sit here, we will be destroyed.
But sir, it is an alien system!
We cannot just give up without trying!
I mean, the Fold System on standby!
Our target will be the far side of the Moon!
Check coordinates, then execute fold directly above the island.
The enemy will not see it coming.
But, should not we get authorization from UN High Command?
We will contact them after we have reached the Moon.
Power system check shows all green.
The ship will execute a fold in five minutes.
It sure has gotten quiet, has not it?
I wonder if it is all over.
That is some ruckus, would not you say?
This sure turned into one hell of a launch ceremony...
I have no idea how much damage we took.
I wonder if our shops are all right.
She has not come back yet.
There are plenty of other places she could have escaped to.
There is nothing to worry about.
That girl's pretty sharp about some things, you know?
You want to go back, too, do not you?
Look, I will not force you or anything.
Anyway, we are leaving, so it is got nothing to do with us.
This is just a one-seater, is not it?
Cannot you even put on a helmet straight?
You should not let a little something like this scare you!
They are executing a fold near the surface?!
Locate their de-fold point at once!
Captain, I am picking up an object below the ship.
We are at the far side of the Moon.
It is much smaller than that, sir.
I will put it on screen.
No, the ship is moving toward it.
I am trying, but there is no response!
We must really be in outer space.
Is that what it looks like to you?
Well, it is not an alarm clock, that is for sure.
I cannot tell her that we are leaking air.
Hey, do not get so worked up.
I sure hope the booster works.
Now then, where is the Macross?
The remaining enemy forces appear to have been destroyed.
What is the status on the evacuees in the shelter?
They are being brought on board.
Fortunately, there do not seem to be many dead or wounded.
Have you been able to contact UN High Command?
I have called and called, but...
And it is not a malfunction?
We are just inside the orbit of Pluto.
I said we should not have tried to fold.
There is no need to worry.
If we made it this far out, we can just fold again and go back.
It looks like the Fold System has completely disappeared.
But that means we cannot go back!
It looks like we are in for a long trip.
Hikaru and Minmay's joy at being saved is short-lived.
Ironically, the section of the Macross that they have flown into
has been sealed off from the rest of the giant ship.
Not a single person knows where they are.
With no means of escaping their forced confinement,
Hikaru and Minmay must watch as time ticks cruelly away.
I will not follow it anymore,
the shadow you cast as you run away
We all keep running until the end,
but we still cannot see the goal
Even now, I keep running toward
the light that shines so far away
